verses.roman:
āsi' kahe,--geluṅ muñi kīrtana niṣedhite
agni ulkā mora mukhe lāge ācambite

synonyms: āsi'-coming to me; kahe—he said; geluṅ—went; muñi—I; kīrtana—congregational chanting; niṣedhite—to stop; agni ulkā—flames of fire; mora—my; mukhe—in the face; lāge—come in contact; ācambite—all of a sudden.
translation: "After coming to me, the orderly said, 'When I went to stop the congregational chanting, suddenly flames struck my face.
